description: CANADA WATER STATION: This station has short London Overground platforms. Customers are advised to travel in the front 4 coaches and listen to on-board announcements.
ROTHERHITHE STATION: This station has short platforms. Customers are advised to travel in the front 4 coaches and listen to on-board announcements.
SYDENHAM STATION: This station has short platforms. Customers are advised to travel in the front 8 coaches and listen to on-board announcements.

Hackney Downs: No Step Free Access - Hackney Central: No Step Free Access - Step free access is not available between Hackney Central and Hackney Downs (platform 1 towards Liverpool Street) due to a faulty lift. Call us on 0343 222 1234 for further help.
New Cross Gate: No Step Free Access - Step free access is not available to platforms 1, 2 and 5 due to a faulty lift. Call us on 0343 222 1234 if you need further information.

Crystal Palace: No Step Free Access - Step free access is not available to platform 1 towards London Bridge (via Peckham Rye) and Victoria due to a faulty lift. Call us on 0343 222 1234 if you need help planning your journey.
Hoxton: No Step Free Access - Step free access is not available to the southbound platform due to a faulty lift. Call us on 0343 222 1234 if you need help planning your journey.
